message: Just as a matter of interest. Each time you've purchased a new gaming platform (including a new gaming PC), which game(s) did you pick up with it?

Here are mine, roughly in reversed chronological order:

PSP: WipEout Pulse and Tekken: Dark Resurrection.

PS3: Heavenly Sword and Ratchet & Clank: Tools of Destruction. I really bought the console for Uncharted, which had just come out, but no local retailers had it in stock. So I placed a web order for it that same day, but only got it a week or two later.

Wii: EA Playground (*blushes*). I wanted a second game to try out the motion controls, but since my local stores had neither WiiPlay nor Raving Rabbids in stock, EA Playground looked like the best bet.

DS: Metroid Prime Hunters and Sonic Rush. Ordered Yoshi's Island online the same day.

GameCube: Metroid Prime

Xbox 360: When I bought the console, I already had Hitman: Blood Money, Condemned: Criminal Origins and Kameo. Bought Ninety-Nine Nights and Enchanted Arms with the console.

PS2: God of War and ICO. Placed a web order that same day for Devil May Cry 3, Shadow Hearts: Covenant, Jak 3 and Shin Megami Tensei: Nocturne.

My last gaming PC: Fable: The Lost Chapters, Dungeon Siege 2 and Knights of the Old Republic 2.
Gaming PC before that one: Morrowind and Neverwinter Nights.
